description: This file contains Pydantic schema definitions for API request and response models, including data item schemas, query parameter schemas, health check schemas, and natural language query schemas. It also includes utility functions related to object ID serialization.

classes.name: HealthResponse
classes.description: Schema for basic health check response, indicating system status.

classes.name: QueryParams
classes.description: Schema for standard query parameters used in list endpoints, including filtering, sorting, and pagination.

classes.name: PaginationMeta
classes.description: Schema for pagination metadata, including total count, limit, and offset.

classes.name: DataItemIn
classes.description: Schema for creating or updating data items, allowing flexible data payloads.

classes.name: DataItemOut
classes.description: Schema representing a data item as returned from the API, including an ID and data payload.

classes.name: DataItemsPage
classes.description: Schema for paginated list of data items, including items and pagination metadata.

classes.name: NLQRequest
classes.description: Schema for natural language query request payload, including optional collection and query parameters.

classes.name: NLQResponse
classes.description: Schema for responses to NLQ requests, including the original query, derived filter, results, and pagination info.

methods.name: serialize_object_id
methods.description: Utility function to serialize an object ID to string, handling None values.
